attributes.action: We ask the UK Parliament to disregard the result of the recent EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
In law the referendum is advisory and non-binding, and cannot override the constitutional principle of parliamentary sovereignty.
The expressed preference of the clear majority of MPs is to remain within the EU.
attributes.background: The referendum process was lamentably irresponsible and mendacious. It misled large numbers of people and produced a deeply damaging result which threatens the unity of the country, the economic  prosperity of our people, and our relations with our key international allies.
